item.title: RT Jack Gordley: Introducing ADB Chat, an LLM chatbot built with @LangchainAI, @streamlit, and the @Android Debug Bridge to aid in Android Forensics i...
item.description:
RT Jack Gordley
Introducing ADB Chat, an LLM chatbot built with @LangchainAI, @streamlit, and the @Android Debug Bridge to aid in Android Forensics investigations. Simply plug in your Android Device and chat with files, processes, and other system info https://github.com/jgordley/chat-adb
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jack Gordley: Excited to share my new Google Calendar assistant built with @nextjs, @FastAPI, and @MongoDB. Core logic built using @LangChainAI and...
item.description:
RT Jack Gordley
Excited to share my new Google Calendar assistant built with @nextjs, @FastAPI, and @MongoDB. Core logic built using @LangChainAI and the @OpenAI API. A lot is possible right now using LLMs and simple tool definitions, such as the GCal API specs: https://gordles.io/posts/calvin
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT MyScale: The #AI-powered #chatbot is a game-changer for the future. With #RAG empowerment, your chatbot takes competition to the next level🚀. �...
item.description:
RT MyScale
The #AI-powered #chatbot is a game-changer for the future. With #RAG empowerment, your chatbot takes competition to the next level🚀.

💡Introducing our end-to-end RAG solution, using @MyScaleDB and @LangChainAI for cutting-edge chatbot development!
👀👀https://myscale.com/blog/build-rag-enabled-chatbot/
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Sebastian Rojo: Excited to share my latest project for the @Supabase Hackathon! I've developed a unique RAG system that's voice-activated. It's des...
item.description:
RT Sebastian Rojo
Excited to share my latest project for the @Supabase Hackathon! I've developed a unique RAG system that's voice-activated. It's designed to discuss the architecture of any application using a mix of @LangChainAI , @supabase , @nextjs, @FastAPI, and @vocodehq. 🧵
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT João Moura: Stock Analysis with AI Agents, using CrewAI 🚣 Using @LangChainAI tools + LangSmith, running on @Replit A researcher, an analyst and...
item.description:
RT João Moura
Stock Analysis with AI Agents, using CrewAI 🚣
Using @LangChainAI tools + LangSmith, running on @Replit

A researcher, an analyst and an investment advisor Agents come together to built a recommendation on any stock out there ✨

lmk if you like and want more of this! 😉

item.title: RT Daniel San: Introducing @MistralAI as your copilot in VSCode! 🚀 Effortlessly integrate Mistral AI with CodeGPT to enhance your coding experience...
item.description:
RT Daniel San
Introducing @MistralAI as your copilot in VSCode! 🚀

Effortlessly integrate Mistral AI with CodeGPT to enhance your coding experience.

Try out the models:
- mistral-tiny
- mistral-small
- mistral-medium

Check the documentation here: https://docs.codegpt.co/docs/tutorial-ai-providers/mistral

Created with… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1736472963325600157

item.title: 🦜🔗LangChain Ecosystem Update (by @CobusGreylingZA) We've made a lot of changes to the LangChain ecosystem - but don't just take our word for it ...
item.description:
🦜🔗LangChain Ecosystem Update (by @CobusGreylingZA)

We've made a lot of changes to the LangChain ecosystem - but don't just take our word for it

@CobusGreylingZA wrote a great writeup of what's changed and what all the different components are

Blog: https://cobusgreyling.medium.com/the-langchain-ecosystem-is-expanding-at-a-tremendous-pace-135756e162e9

item.title: For an introduction to what it takes to build "context-aware reasoning applications" (the main goal of LangChain) check out @hwchase17's recent TED ta...
item.description:
For an introduction to what it takes to build "context-aware reasoning applications" (the main goal of LangChain) check out @hwchase17's recent TED talk

Dives into:

The 4 different ways to provide context to LLMs
The 6 different cognitive architectures

https://www.ted.com/talks/harrison_chase_the_magical_ai_assistants_of_the_future_and_the_engineering_behind_them
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Alexander Chen: A great demo by @lizziepika made w/ @LangChainAI + @streamlit + @Replit + Gemini API ♊ lets you try out multimodal chat w/ Gemini ...
item.description:
RT Alexander Chen
A great demo by @lizziepika made w/ @LangChainAI + @streamlit + @Replit + Gemini API ♊ lets you try out multimodal chat w/ Gemini right in your browser. 👀 🗨️ Code below too! 👇


Lizzie Siegle: Google's Gemini API just came out!

Here's multimodal chat💬 w/ the new Gemini♊️ API + @LangChainAI, @streamlit, @replit!

🧵

item.title: RT Roger Taylor: New @DataScienceHarp piece dissects how WebBaseLoader, SeleniumURLLoader & NewsURLLoader in @LangChainAI 🦜️🔗 shape #RAG model ...
item.description:
RT Roger Taylor
New @DataScienceHarp piece dissects how WebBaseLoader, SeleniumURLLoader & NewsURLLoader in @LangChainAI 🦜️🔗 shape #RAG model performance.
Some surprising context recall vs precision tradeoffs! Click to explore key metrics & optimization tips. https://buff.ly/3Trs2Xu
#LLMs

item.description:
RT ai geek (wishesh) ⚡️
i am thrilled to announce the release of our second business use case-specific open-source LLM:

Radiantloom Support Assist 🚀🚀

this model is fine-tuned for customer-facing web interfaces.

B2B SaaS, e-commerce, corporate websites, and personal websites all face challenges in… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1736253434448236774

item.title: RT Peter Jausovec: mistral AI is very simple - two endpoints, one for embedding and the other one for chat completions. i spent most of the time imple...
item.description:
RT Peter Jausovec
mistral AI is very simple - two endpoints, one for embedding and the other one for chat completions.

i spent most of the time implementing “talk to a PDF functionality” using @LangChainAI


Peter Jausovec: Mistral AI: Move over ChatGPT! https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1nAKEajXAeeKL

item.description:
RT Und3rf10w
I updated my @RobertsSpaceInd's Star Citizen virtual AI application some. You can now hold a conversation with the various components; in addition to a more streamlined setup and configuration. Finally, I added external integration w/ Cornerstone's apps:

item.title: RT Vinit Agrawal: Made a video about using LangChain's (@LangChainAI) Self-Querying Query Constructor and use it in Slack's (@SlackHQ) search API. Sel...
item.description:
RT Vinit Agrawal
Made a video about using LangChain's (@LangChainAI) Self-Querying Query Constructor and use it in Slack's (@SlackHQ) search API.

Self-Querying is usually used with vector stores like @weaviate_io, but here I am using it for Slack's search.

Check it out:
https://youtu.be/DTifxo4hhzA?si=knQ87py3QGvMr2ws
item.author: LangChain
